entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain near noon then to periods of rain or freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
